text: Beverly LaHaye (April 30, 1929 - April 14, 2024) was an American Christian conservative activist and author. She was born in Detroit, Michigan. LaHaye founded Concerned Women for America (CWA) in San Diego, California in 1979 and was the organization's chair.Biography: Beverly LaHaye at Women History She was the wife of Tim LaHaye, the late evangelical Christian minister and prolific author of the Left Behind series. LaHaye died in El Cajon, California on April 14, 2024, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Beverly LaHaye Institute * About Beverly LaHaye * * * Norwood, Arlisha.
